channel.title: TKG Extensions on ModernApps Learning by VMware Tanzu Home
channel.description: Recent content in TKG Extensions on ModernApps Learning by VMware Tanzu Home

item.title: Configure vSphere with Tanzu behind a Proxy plus TKG Extensions
item.description: This blog post explains how to use vSphere with Tanzu behind a network proxy and the different options to configure the necessary proxy settings on the TKC level and the TKG Extensions.
